lines.text: Of course global warming is real!
What did you think, it was Groudon using its drought ability?
Blue orbs, Red orbs, whichever expands the landmasses works for me!
Pff, Archie wants there to be more ocean...
It's just a bunch of seaweed and some subpar fish Pokemon.
Not to mention that HUMANS LIVE ON LAND! We need land to live, Archie!
*Sigh* If you see him, could you knock some sense into him for me?
